summary: Proof 474-478 recorded and OTS applied to proof markdown only. CID/JSON deferred due to ongoing IPFS gateway metadata retrieval failures. NFT minting completed for 7 Ducks of Hope Day 138 Part 1-2 and Seed of Hope Day 170 Part 1-2, but retrievability remains unstable. Primary Dataset OTS continued file-by-file but not fully completed due to power constraints.

proofs.notes: OTS applied to proof md files only. CID/JSON deferred.

issues.symptom: 504 Gateway Timeout / unable to retrieve content within timeout period
issues.impact: CID/JSON generation deferred due to inability to reliably retrieve metadata
issues.mitigation: Proceed with md+OTS first; generate CID/JSON later when retrievability stabilizes

issues.impact: Primary Dataset processing not fully completed for the day
issues.mitigation: Continue remaining files when power is available
